description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Destroy thousands of blocks through 50 levels of increasing difficulty with this retro style game! Includes many items and bonuses such as multiball, expand paddle, laser and much more!
